title: Guard Duty
description: Stand watch through the night. Keep your eyes sharp and your blade ready.

sea.title: Deck Watch
sea.description: Stand watch on the foredeck. Keep your eyes on the horizon and your ears on the waves.

success.text: A quiet night. The sergeant commends your vigilance as dawn breaks.

failure.text: You dozed off at your post. A kicked bucket woke the camp. The shame burns.

decline.text: 'Too tired for watch duty?' The sergeant's voice drips with contempt.

title: Camp Patrol
description: Walk the perimeter with two men. Keep your eyes open for trouble.

sea.title: Hull Inspection
sea.description: Walk the lower decks with two men. Check for leaks, stowaways, and anything amiss below.

success.text: You circle the camp twice. Nothing stirs but the wind. Your men trust you more.

failure.text: You missed a gap in the pickets. The sergeant finds it on his own rounds.

decline.text: Someone else walks the cold night in your place. They won't forget it.

title: Firewood Collection
description: The camp needs fuel. Grab an axe and take two men to gather wood.

sea.title: Deck Scrubbing
sea.description: Salt spray coats everything. Grab a brush and bucket. The deck needs cleaning.

success.text: You haul back enough wood for three fires. The camp will be warm tonight.

failure.text: You brought back green wood that won't burn. The men huddle cold around smoking fires.

decline.text: Your brothers shiver in the cold while you sat idle. They remember.

title: Equipment Inspection
description: Help the quartermaster check gear. Report anything broken or missing.

sea.title: Rigging Check
sea.description: Help the bosun inspect lines and canvas. Report any frayed ropes or torn sails.

success.text: You catch two cracked shields and a rusted buckle. The sergeant nods approval.

failure.text: You missed a split sword grip. It broke in the next fight. A man nearly died.

decline.text: The sergeant does the inspection himself. He remembers you refused.

title: Muster Inspection
description: Stand for inspection before the lord. Clean your kit and stand straight.

sea.title: Deck Muster
sea.description: Assemble on deck for the lord's inspection. Clean your kit and stand ready at the rail.

success.text: Your gear gleams and your bearing is proper. The lord's eye passes over you with satisfaction.

failure.text: Rust on your blade, mud on your boots. The lord's frown marks you out from the ranks.

decline.text: Missing muster is unthinkable. The sergeant's punishment will be memorable.

title: Sentry Post
description: Watch the road from the hilltop. Report anything strange.

sea.title: Masthead Watch
sea.description: Take your turn at the masthead. Watch for sails, land, or anything amiss on the water.

success.text: You spot dust on the horizon and report it properly. The captain thanks you personally.

failure.text: You were watching birds when the scout rode past. The sergeant heard about it.

decline.text: 'Sentry duty too boring for you?' The sergeant's face promises trouble.
